welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Purcellville, the charming town known for its scenic beauty and friendly community. We invite you to explore our quaint shops, delicious local cuisine, and rich history. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport serves mainly domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eastern Wv Regional Airport/Shepherd Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Eastern Wv Regional Airport/Shepherd Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport provides services for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
